name: What'sHappeningNOW
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
What's happening NOW? Not tomorrow, not once a week... NOW! Add this headline news skill to your flash briefing for up-to-the-minute updates on all current events. 

If you would like to find out more about any of the headlines you hear, simply click the "read more" link in your Alexa app.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
